channel.title: JAVA hotspot VM warning
channel.description:
YO when i run my client i get this message.
Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM warning: Using incremental CMS is deprecated and will likely be removed in a future release
AND then the client runs and works fine. I am trying to create a jar with this client but cannot due to this warning. I need it gone. IM on a 718 and know how to work with Java just need a little bit of knowledge to figure this one out. REPLY asap.

item.title: JAVA hotspot VM warning
item.dc:creator: @malimt malimt
item.description:
@malimt wrote:

First off bud, update your java jdk/jre to 8_40 or 8…
This is one common problem everyone is having, now I haven’t personally seen your error before, but I would suggest doing this anyway, it could also help you out.
Then, fill me in with a lil more details about the client/error your getting

EDIT: Since you said “718” Check your client revision and version too!

Read full topic

item.title: JAVA hotspot VM warning

item.description:
@Jesus_Hands wrote:

YO when i run my client i get this message.

Java HotSpot™ 64-Bit Server VM warning: Using incremental CMS is deprecated and will likely be removed in a future release

AND then the client runs and works fine. I am trying to create a jar with this client but cannot due to this warning. I need it gone. IM on a 718 and know how to work with Java just need a little bit of knowledge to figure this one out. REPLY asap.
